Text: This is not ALL of the books for any of the systems listed, there are about 10 books missing from Pathfinder (the newest ones), Most of Shadowrun is missing, and five of the saga edition books are missing. Excepting the missing pathfinder books (a few of which noone can find) the missing books are easily available here on thepiratebay. Saying ALL when you mean A FEW OF is just plain misleading.
Ok well you can be happy I uploaded anything you little shit whore.
